name: o.nim
description:
It's late.

You are talking with your partner on the phone.

Is it going to be you, or your partner who will hang up the phone first?

(o.nim is a circular variation of the 2 player minimalist abstract strategy game nim. o.nim was developed during Master \ BUG / Jr Game Jam #1 by Arda Cevik.)

Many thanks to Barbara Sedders and Cagdas Yildirim!
